column5: Have a great day every one. I am glad to finally be able to say I am getting the boat in the water today. I have only wet a line once this year and it wasn't in my boat. Lake Erie here we come.Hopefully we will have a report for ya later. Be safe on the water today and good luck.
Be keerful and catch lotsa fishes!!!  Keep the camera handy eh!
Looking forward to your report....fish or no fish, Bud. Have a great day!
